trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_SEQ_00<tab>Regitt has a message for you.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the dwarven designer at Radisca's Round.
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_SEQ_02<tab>The dwarven designer has tasked you with crafting eye-catching custom options, then delivering the completed items to Regitt.
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the dwarven designer at Radisca's Round.

TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_REGITT_000_000<tab>You're a wanted <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. In a good way, I mean! One of the two brothers in charge of our tanks' exterior design has asked me to ask you if he can borrow your artisanal expertise. I always forget which one is which...
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_REGITT_000_001<tab>Anyway, if you're free to lend a hand, you'll find him collecting parts and materials over at Radisca's Round.

TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_010<tab>Lali-ho, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Regitt passed on my message, then? Good! Now we can get down to making some properly eye-catching accessories.
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_011<tab>See, if I were a merchant in the market for a tank, I'd want a catalog of custom options designed to grab folks' attention the moment I rolled into town!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_012<tab>My big brother, on the other hand, seems fixed on the idea of fading into the background. What a wasted opportunity!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_020<tab>I need you to help me change his mind...by forging an irresistible range of shiny silver attachments!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_030<tab>I need you to help me change his mind...by crafting an unforgettable assortment of colorful pennants!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_040<tab>I need you to help me change his mind...by mixing a seductive selection of vivid paints!

TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_050<tab>Here, take these materials from the stock I've collected...and feel free to ask if you need more. Once you're done, deliver the goods to Regitt─that'll show my brother the benefits of standing out from the crowd!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_060<tab>Take the finished product back to the Anvil. Regitt will know what to do!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_061<tab>Take the finished product back to the Anvil. Regitt will know what to do!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_062<tab>Take the finished product back to the Anvil. Regitt will know what to do!
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_070<tab>Looking for some spare materials? Help yourself.
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_071<tab>Looking for some spare materials? Help yourself.
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_DWARF03925_000_072<tab>Looking for some spare materials? Help yourself.
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_REGITT_000_080<tab>Got something for me?
TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_REGITT_000_090<tab>So this is the kind of thing he was talking about...

TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_REGITT_000_091<tab>Assuming our tanks become commonplace, the merchant caravans'll be wanting ways to distinguish themselves from their competitors. And these custom options are just the answer we need! Fine work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_REGITT_000_100<tab>This...all feels so familiar. You're saying it was the younger brother this time? But...the concept is the complete bloody opposite! Ugh, I'm sorry these dolts have dragged you into their little design dispute...

TEXT_BANDWA124_03925_REGITT_000_101<tab>Still, I suppose if this rivalry results in more custom options for our buyers, then it's a victory for us either way. Thanks again for your fine work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
